alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene, southeastern Clay, west central Pemiscot and southern Dunklin Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 543 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arbyrd, or near Senath, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Piggott, Senath, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Greenway, Bragg City, Nimmons, Fritz, Lorine, Mounds, West Kennett, Leonard, Bell City, Noland, Hargrave Corner, Bertig, Carryville and Holly Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
